title: Which K-pop groups are doing a comeback this year, 2020 (July and onward)? - Quora

response.answer_text: i honestly don’t know much but if i’m not wrong, Somi is finally having a comeback this month!!!! i’m so excitedddddd!! edit: according to Jin, BTS is having a comeback in october!!!! i can’t wait!!!! also blackpink is dropping their FULL album in september. finally!!! blackpink is going to have a fullll album!!!🥳🥳🥳 b00 bye -Jayne
BTS will have a comeback in 2020's October and Ateez is about to drop a comeback! TXT might have a comeback around the last few months of the year but I'm not sure.
